refnamediv.refpurpose: Reverse Yates' algorithm to give estimated responses

listitem.para: vector of average response, main effects and interaction effects.
identification vector of main and interaction effects.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Reverse Yates' algorithm to give estimated responses.

doe_ryates applies the reverse Yates' algorithm to the effect EF to obtain the estimated response. EF is assumed to be arranged in what is called standard order. (The order of the actual running should, of course, be random).
EF(1,:) is the average response and EF(2:$,:) contain the main effects and interaction effects.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: D = doe_factorial(3); // complete 2^3 design in standard order. y = [60 72 54 68 52 83 45 80]; // Responses to design D. [ef,id] = doe_yates(y); y1 = doe_ryates(ef); // gives the same as Y
